name: Pset_SiteCommon
definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcSite. Please note that several site attributes are handled directly at the IfcSite instance, the site number (or short name) by IfcSite.Name, the site name (or long name) by IfcSite.LongName, and the description (or comments) by IfcSite.Description. The land title number is also given as an explicit attribute IfcSite.LandTitleNumber. Actual site quantities, like site perimeter, site area and site volume are provided by IfcElementQuantity, and site classification according to national building code by IfcClassificationReference. The global positioning of the site in terms of Northing and Easting and height above sea level datum is given by IfcSite.RefLongitude, IfcSite.RefLatitude, IfcSite.RefElevation and the postal address by IfcSite.SiteAddress.

localizations.name: Grundstück -  allgemeiner Eigenschaftssatz
localizations.definition: Property Set Definition in German

properties.name: Reference
properties.definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'). Used to store the non-classification driven internal project type.

localizations.name: Referenz ID
localizations.definition: Identifikator der projektinternen Referenz für dieses Grundstück, z.B. nach der Grundstückklassifizierung des Bauherrn. Wird verwendet, wenn keine allgemein anerkanntes Klassifizierungssystem angewandt wird.

localizations.name: Reference
localizations.definition: Référence à l'identifiant d'un type spécifié dans le contexte du projet (exemple : "type A1"). Utilisé pour enregistrer un type sans recourir à une classification.

localizations.name: 参照記号
localizations.definition: このプロジェクトにおける参照記号(例：A-1)。分類コードではなく内部で使用されるプロジェクトタイプとして使用されるもの。

localizations.name: 참조 ID
localizations.definition: 이 프로젝트의 참조 ID (예 : A-1). 분류 코드가 아닌 내부에서 사용되는 프로젝트 형식으로 사용됩니다.

properties.name: BuildableArea
properties.definition: The area of site utilization expressed as a maximum value according to local building codes.

localizations.name: bebaubare Fläche
localizations.definition: bebaubare Fläche als maximale überbaubare Fläche des Grundstücks.

localizations.name: ValeurSurfaceConstructible
localizations.definition: Surface constructible maximale en fonction des contraintes d'urbanisme.

localizations.name: 建築可能面積
localizations.definition: 建築基準により建築可能な最大の面積。

localizations.name: 건축 가능 면적
localizations.definition: 속성정의

properties.name: SiteCoverageRatio
properties.definition: The ratio of the utilization,  TotalArea / BuildableArea, expressed as a maximum value. The ratio value may be used to derive BuildableArea.

localizations.name: Grundflächenzahl
localizations.definition: Grundflächenzahl als Verhältnis der bebaubaren Fläche zur Bruttogrundstücksfläche.

localizations.name: RatioSurfaceConstructible
localizations.definition: Valeur maximale de la surface constructible exprimée en ratio. La valeur du ratio peut être utilisée pour déterminer la surface constructible.

localizations.name: 建蔽率
localizations.definition: 建築基準により最大となる、敷地面積(IfcElementQuantity)と建築面積(IfcBuildingのIfcElementQuantity)の比率。

localizations.name: 건폐율
localizations.definition: TotalArea / BuildableArea로 표시되는 이용 가능한 비율의 최대값입니다.

properties.name: FloorAreaRatio
properties.definition: The ratio of all floor areas to the buildable area as the maximum floor area utilization of the site as a maximum value according to local building codes.

localizations.name: Geschossflächenzahl
localizations.definition: Geschossflächenzahl als Verhältnis der gesamten Geschossfläche aller Vollgeschosse der baulichen Anlagen auf einem Baugrundstück zu der Fläche des Baugrundstücks.

localizations.name: ratio de surface de planchers
localizations.definition: Ratio de la surface totale de planchers à la surface constructible, indication de la valeur maximale de la surface de planchers selon la règlementation locale (coefficient d'occupation des sols, N.d.T.)

localizations.name: 容積率
localizations.definition: 建築基準により最大となる床面積と敷地面積(IfcElementQuantities)の比率。

properties.name: BuildingHeightLimit
properties.definition: Allowed maximum height of buildings on this site - according to local building codes.

localizations.name: maximale Bebauungshöhe
localizations.definition: Maximale Bebauungshöhe die auf diesem Grundstück zulässig ist.

localizations.name: HauteurMaximale
localizations.definition: Hauteur maximale des bâtiments autorisée sur ce site.

localizations.name: 建物高さ制限
localizations.definition: 各地域の建築基準により許可される建物の高さの最大値。

localizations.name: 건물 높이 제한
localizations.definition: TotalArea / BuildableArea로 표시되는 이용 가능한 비율의 최대값입니다.

properties.name: TotalArea
properties.definition: Total planned area for the site. Used for programming the site space.

localizations.name: Bruttogrundstücksfläche
localizations.definition: Gesamte Grundstücksfläche für diese Bauaufgabe.

localizations.name: SurfaceBruteProgrammee
localizations.definition: Surface totale brute. Définie en phase de programmation.

localizations.name: 延べ面積
localizations.definition: 敷地にたいする延べ計画面積。敷地空間の計画に使用。

localizations.name: 연면적
localizations.definition: 부지에 대한 총 계획 면적. 호텔 공간 계획에 사용됩니다.
